query.statement:
SELECT A.KUNNR ,A.NAME1 ,A.LAND1 AS LAND1 ,C.CTEXT2 AS LAND1_NM FROM SAPHEE.KNA1 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST003 AS B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.KUNNR = A.KUNNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS C ON C.MANDT = A.MANDT --AND C.LANG = #G_MANDT# AND C.LANG = #G_LANG# -- ¼öÁ¤ AND C.CODE1 = 'LAND1' AND C.CODE2 = A.REGIO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.KUNNR LIKE '%'||#KUNNR#
WITH UR
